page.title: 13AN AGRICULTURAL CONTRACTOR
page.content: This one man firm,based in the village of Longville,offers an excellent service to farmers within a 15 mile radius. The owner has a wide range of {machinery }and he is prepared to undertake a variety of{jobs}at competitive rates. For instance hewill cut hedges with a Flail Hedge-cutter for Â£7 per hour.He will also undertake Manure-spreading with a Rotaspreader, silage lugging or mole ploughing at the same rate. He has a total of 3 tractors and 14 different machines,all in good working order. He has been in business for 5 years and houses his equipment in the buildings surrounding his father's farm. He works long hours during the busy farming months of the year and utilises the time when weather is bad,for maintenance and repair of his vehicles.
